translation.en: [man] Four-star general. There is no rank higher in the United States military.
translation.it: Generale a quattro stelle, il grado più alto dell'esercito americano.

translation.en: You report only to Sec Def and POTUS, the commander in chief.
translation.it: Fa rapporto solo al Segretario della Difesa e al Presidente.

translation.en: Congratulations, General Naird.
[Mark Naird] Thank you. Thank you.
It has always been my dream to command a service branch.
translation.it: Ho sempre sognato di comandare un ramo delle forze armate.

translation.en: I have been shot down, both literally and figuratively,
translation.it: Ho subito colpi su colpi, letteralmente e metaforicamente,

translation.en: but I have always gotten back up.
All right.
My old CO used to say that the greatest asset in an F-35,
translation.it: Il mio vecchio comandante diceva che la risorsa più preziosa di un F-35,

translation.en: and that is a $100 million plane,
translation.it: un aereo da 100 milioni di dollari,

translation.en: is its pilot.
When I was-- All right. I'll skip ahead.
There's much more that I could say.
translation.it: C'è molto altro che potrei dire.

translation.en: I only wish that...
my parents could have been here to see this.
But they were unable to get flights from New Jersey in time.
translation.it: Ma non hanno trovato un aereo per il New Jersey.

translation.en: Maggie, Erin, this is a Naird family team win.
translation.it: Maggie, Erin, questa è una vittoria per la famiglia Naird.

translation.en: -So proud of you. -Thanks.
I don't get it.
Dad, when you made three-star, we had 100 guests and a band.
translation.it: Quando diventasti tenente generale, c'erano 100 ospiti e una band.

translation.en: It's a different administration, bug. This one's... a little more chaotic.
translation.it: È cambiata l'amministrazione. Questa è un po' più caotica.

translation.en: The Air Force chief's house in Arlington is gorgeous and comes with a staff. Thank you.
translation.it: La casa dell'Air Force ad Arlington è stupenda e ha anche lo staff. Grazie.

translation.en: Dad, I am so proud of you.
-Thanks. -General.
Joint Chiefs in five minutes. Come on.
translation.it: Riunione dello Stato maggiore tra cinque minuti.

translation.en: Get lost, Naird. This is for four-stars.
translation.it: È solo per i generali a quattro stelle.

translation.en: Like me.
They didn't tell you? Or did you forget? Like you forgot to get competitive bidding for the AT-6B.
translation.it: Non te l'hanno detto? O l'hai dimenticato? Come con la gara d'appalto per l'AT-6B.

translation.en: Tell me what? That you wear a dress?
translation.it: Dirmi cosa? Che porti un vestito?

translation.en: I knew that already.
Gender roles.
Offensive. And out of date. Just like you.
translation.it: Offensivo e fuori moda. Proprio come te.

translation.en: But I don't have to listen to it anymore.
Good luck with your retirement, Kick. And I say that facetiously,
translation.it: Buona fortuna con la pensione, Kick. E lo dico scherzosamente,

translation.en: because you're a crook and a womanizer, and I hate your guts.
translation.it: perché sei un furfante e un donnaiolo, e ti odio a morte.

translation.en: God, that felt good.
Welcome, gentlemen, thank you for joining us. POTUS wants to make some changes.
translation.it: Prego, signori. Il Presidente ha delle novità.

translation.en: He's tweeting about it in five minutes, so let's hope you like it.
translation.it: SEGRETARIO DELLA DIFESA Manderà un tweet tra cinque minuti. Spero vi piacerà.

translation.en: I wanna welcome our newest four-star general, Mark Naird,
translation.it: Do il benvenuto al nostro nuovo generale, Mark Naird, prima vice dell'Air Force.

translation.en: formerly number two at the Air Force.
translation.it: Mark Naird, prima vice dell'Air Force.

translation.en: He's done an amazing job, has a most distinguished career.
translation.it: Ha fatto un ottimo lavoro nella sua brillante carriera.

translation.en: -Our nation's internet in-- -[Mark] Excuse me. Why is Kick still in the room? I don't-- Hmm.
translation.it: - L'Internet della... - Scusi. Perché Kick è ancora qui?

translation.en: Our nation's internet, including Twitter,
runs through our vulnerable space satellites.
translation.it: dipende dai nostri vulnerabili satelliti spaziali.

translation.en: POTUS wants complete space dominance.
translation.it: Il Presidente vuole il completo dominio dello spazio.

translation.en: Boots on the moon by 2024.
To that end, the president is creating a new branch.
translation.it: Pertanto, il Presidente creerà un nuovo ramo.

translation.en: Space Force.
Which Mark will run.
[scoffs] Hmm? What?
In close cooperation with Air Force, which Kick will still head.
translation.it: In stretta collaborazione con l'Air Force, al comando di Kick.

translation.en: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me.
[John] This is not a joke. His words!
translation.it: Non è uno scherzo. Parole sue.

translation.en: Boots on the moon in 2024.
Actually, he said, "Boobs on the moon," but we believe that to be a typo.
translation.it: Ha detto "Riporno sulla Luna", ma era probabilmente un refuso.

translation.en: This is bullshit. Space is part of the air.
translation.it: Sono stronzate. Lo spazio fa parte dell'aria.

translation.en: Naird works for me.
Uh, hang on. Hang on. I don't think there's air in space.
translation.it: Un attimo. Non credo che ci sia aria nello spazio.

translation.en: There certainly isn't any damn water, Admiral, so you don't get an opinion.
translation.it: Di certo non c'è acqua, Ammiraglio, quindi stanne fuori.

translation.en: Air Force used to just be part of the Army, Kick.
translation.it: L'Air Force faceva parte dell'Esercito, Kick.

translation.en: I'd like to stuff you both back in.
If there's no air or water, two questions.
translation.it: Se non c'è aria né acqua...

translation.en: What is it exactly, and why can't they hear you scream?
translation.it: Che cos'è e perché non riescono a sentirti urlare?

translation.en: Well, at least Coast Guard isn't last in line anymore.
translation.it: Almeno la Guardia Costiera non è più all'ultimo posto.

translation.en: -Oh, you're still last. -Oh, definitely last.
You're behind Salvation Army, Louis.
[laughing]
So, how are you handling this?
translation.it: Come ti fa sentire la cosa?

translation.en: I know you wanted the Air Force, and you're not the most flexible person.
translation.it: So che volevi l'Air Force, e non sei molto flessibile.

translation.en: [Mark] I can be flexible if I'm ordered to be.
translation.it: Posso esserlo, se me lo ordinano.

translation.en: I'll admit I was a little disappointed at first.
translation.it: Ammetto che, all'inizio, sono rimasto un po' deluso.

translation.en: But then I saw this painting. John Paul Jones.
translation.it: Ma poi ho visto un quadro. John Paul Jones.

translation.en: And it made me think.
The founder of the Space Force, that's going to be me.
translation.it: Diventerò il fondatore della Space Force.

translation.en: This is such a great opportunity to start something from the ground up.
translation.it: È una grande opportunità per iniziare qualcosa da zero.

translation.en: We're gonna build a huge new base.
Well, DC real estate, the way it is,
translation.it: Dato il mercato immobiliare a Washington,

translation.en: you'll be lucky if it's this side of Dulles Airport.
translation.it: potresti finire vicino all'Aeroporto di Dulles.

translation.en: Oh, well, it's definitely gonna be on the other side of Dulles.
translation.it: Sarà sicuramente dopo l'aeroporto, lontano dal centro.

translation.en: By about 2,000 miles.
-We're going to Colorado. -What?
There's this old NORAD facility that's got a lot of potential.
translation.it: C'è una vecchia struttura del NORAD lì, che ha un enorme potenziale.

translation.en: And Colorado? Oh!
Up and coming. Did you know Amazon put their new headquarters there?
translation.it: Va di moda. Sai che Amazon vi ha costruito la sua nuova sede?

translation.en: Really? No. But they seriously considered it.
translation.it: - Davvero? - No, ma l'hanno preso in considerazione.

translation.en: You and Erin are gonna love it there. -Gonna learn how to ride horses. -[sobs]
translation.it: A te e a Erin piacerà un mondo. Imparerete a cavalcare.

translation.en: [Mark] It's gonna be a good year.
And next year at this time...
translation.it: E l'anno prossimo, in questo periodo...

translation.en: we might have boots on the moon.
Big launch today, huh?
Launch?
At the new base.
What base?
Oh, right. It's a secret.
If you told me, you'd have to kill me, right? [laughs]
translation.it: Se me lo dici, poi dovrai uccidermi, eh?

translation.en: ♪ That's what I wanted to be ♪
♪ But now that I am a spaceman ♪
-[Mark] Hey. -Sir.
There's a guy in the trunk. Hold him till after the launch.
translation.it: Incarcera il tizio nel bagagliaio fin dopo il lancio.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
What the fuck, man?
So then you say do bat your eye--
-Big launch today, sir. -Yes.
The congressional delegation will be arriving for lunch.
translation.it: La delegazione del Congresso arriverà a pranzo.

translation.en: You have to speak for ten minutes -at the local high school. -[sighs]
translation.it: Dovrà parlare dieci minuti al liceo locale.

translation.en: Don't worry. We have a new helo pilot. We'll get you in and out of there in no time.
translation.it: Abbiamo un nuovo pilota. I trasferimenti saranno veloci.

translation.en: And the launch at 1700 is set to be a live feed on the East Coast.
translation.it: E il lancio alle 17 sarà trasmesso in diretta sulla Costa Orientale.

translation.en: You have a light day today, so you can start in the gym,
translation.it: Non ha molti impegni. Può iniziare in palestra.

translation.en: and your calendar says it's a leg day.
translation.it: Secondo l'agenda, oggi si allenano le gambe.

translation.en: Oh! Dr. Mallory is waiting for you.
Yes, he is.
-He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.it: - Ha detto di non dirglielo. - Grazie, Brad.

translation.en: [Mallory] We need to cancel the launch.
No. Senator Schugler, Pitosi, and the angry young congresswoman are coming.
translation.it: No. Verranno il Senatore Schugler, Pitosi e la giovane deputata arrabbiata.

translation.en: They need to see a success so we can keep our funding.
Oh. My idea of success
would not be a six-billion-dollar piece of hardware
translation.it: non sarebbe un'apparecchiatura da sei miliardi di dollari

translation.en: breaking up over Denver.
translation.it: che va in pezzi sopra Denver.

translation.en: That is not going to happen.
Look, I don't like to pull rank,
-but I order you to postpone the launch. -Ah...
translation.it: ma ti ordino di rimandare il lancio.

translation.en: Okay?
There's too much moisture in the air.
We prefer a less ionized environment.
translation.it: È preferibile un ambiente meno ionizzato.

translation.en: You are a civilian advisor.
There are always going to be risks.
Conditions are never perfect.
translation.it: Le condizioni non sono mai perfette.

translation.en: They're supposed to be perfect tomorrow.
The delegation will be back in Washington tomorrow.
translation.it: Domani la delegazione tornerà a Washington.

translation.en: -You know, Mark, when I hired you... -I hired you.
translation.it: - Quando ti ho assunto... - Io ho assunto te.

translation.en: ...I felt your best quality was your ability to listen to good advice.
translation.it: ...sentivo che la tua qualità migliore fosse di seguire i buoni consigli.

translation.en: If you've lost that,
we may have to look elsewhere.
We. Who is this "we" that you keep talking about?
That is above your pay grade.
Nothing is above my pay grade at this base.
translation.it: Qui nulla è oltre le mie competenze.

translation.en: Just postpone the launch, dear.
Nope.
So, no launch today, I hear. No, launch is still on.
translation.it: - Niente lancio oggi, allora. - No, si fa.

translation.en: Oh. I'll have to tell the base biologist.
-What? -She has to collect
all the endangered lizards within 600 yards of the launch site.
translation.it: tutte le lucertole rare nel raggio di 550 metri.

translation.en: I canceled her because Mallory told me the launch was scrubbed.
No! Nobody gets to scrub anything but me.
translation.it: No! Nessuno annulla niente, tranne me.

translation.en: Oh. Got it, sir.
Hello, Yuri.
Oh. Uh, Yuri's in there.
-I know. -He told me not to say anything.
translation.it: - Lo vedo. - Ha detto di non dirglielo.

translation.en: Thank you, Brad.
[with Russian accent] Do you keep breath mints anywhere?
What are you doing in here?
Um, I heard the launch was scrubbed.
That is not accurate, Yuri.
Call me Bobby. It's more reassuring.
translation.it: Mi chiami Bobby. È più rassicurante.

translation.en: Can I see technical specifications for the Epsilon part E-16f fuel pump?
translation.it: Posso vedere le specifiche tecniche della pompa E-16f dell'Epsilon?

translation.en: Why would you need to see that?
Well, as observer from ISS partner country, I just want to... observe it.
translation.it: In quanto osservatore di un Paese della ISS, vorrei osservarlo.

translation.en: Hmm. Well, that is weird.
Your president desires close cooperation and good relations between US and Russia.
translation.it: Il vostro Presidente vuole che ci siano buone relazioni tra Russia e Stati Uniti.

translation.en: Come on. We're not China here.
I'm sure if the president would like me to show you something, he will let me know.
translation.it: Se il Presidente volesse che ti mostrassi qualcosa, me lo direbbe.

translation.en: Very well.
Expect a text from the secure phone. How do you know about the secure phone?
translation.it: - Si aspetti un SMS sul telefono criptato. - Come sai del telefono criptato?

translation.en: I don't know about the secure phone.
-You just said "secure phone." -No, I didn't.
-Yes, you did. You said "secure phone." -I didn't say that.
You just said it.
-No, I did not. -Yes, you did.
Breath mints.
Here they are.
[sergeant] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
translation.it: Non lo so, ma mi hanno detto...

translation.en: [soldiers] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
translation.it: Non lo so, ma mi hanno detto...

translation.en: [sergeant] ♪ Outer space is very cold ♪
[soldiers] ♪ Outer space is very cold... ♪
Yo! Oh.
-General Naird. -We may have to scrub the Epsilon launch.
-Is Yellowjacket ready to show off? -I doubt it.
Oh, for Christ's sake. They're a billion dollars and six months over.
translation.it: Porca miseria, ci è già costato un miliardo e sei mesi.

translation.en: You're right. We should be able to see something.
-Damn right. Let's move. -I'll make a call.
-Are you running? -No. Keep up.
Will Yellowjacket be impressive enough?
First super-pressurized ultra-fast satellite-killer killer missile?
Fucking impressive to me.
Oh. Hey. Looks good.
-Yeah. -[Mark] Sweet.
Very sleek. -Like the yellow fins. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Molto elegante. Belle, le pinne gialle.

translation.en: Do we have enough of these to do a test launch later as well?
translation.it: Ne abbiamo abbastanza per un test di lancio dopo?

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Okay, let's do this.
-Go time. -[man on radio] Roger that, go time.
Well, that's not ready yet.
-How much was that prototype? -Four.
-Million? -Middle schools.
Cost as much as four new middle schools. Fuck!
translation.it: - Quanto quattro nuove scuole medie. - Cazzo!

translation.en: -You are running! -Keep up.
So I hear we're going with Yellowjacket this afternoon? No.
translation.it: - Ho saputo che lanciamo Yellowjacket. - No.

translation.en: Sorry, Sheila. Still have to grab those lizards.
Oh. Fuck Tony's in there.
-Good morning, my general. -Good morning.
I have your daily tweet ready for you to review,
and I think you're gonna love it. You're gonna eat it up. Go. Yum-yum.
translation.it: Penso che ti piacerà un sacco. Leggi, dai.

translation.en: I don't get it.
Any of it?
Okay.
All right.
-You know there's a new Star Wars out? -Yes.
translation.it: - Sai che è uscito il nuovo Star Wars? - Sì.

translation.en: And Wendy's has a new hamburger that they're serving rare, so...
translation.it: E la catena Wendy's serve un nuovo hamburger al sangue...

translation.en: So what I am saying is that if I had a lightsaber,
translation.it: Sto dicendo che, se avessi una spada laser,

translation.en: I would be able to cook...
this hamburger better. There you go. It took a while, but you got it.
translation.it: - meglio l'hamburger. - Ci è voluto un po', ma ci sei arrivato.

translation.en: -How is this relevant to the mission? -That is culturally relevant.
translation.it: - Che c'entra con la missione? - Ha una rilevanza culturale.

translation.en: I don't see how being snarky about a fast-food hamburger is culturally anything.
translation.it: Non vedo che ci sia di culturale nell'essere irriverenti su un hamburger.

translation.en: Do you even understand what is at stake here? I'm trying to put boots on the moon.
translation.it: Ti rendi conto della posta in gioco? Sto cercando di rimandarci sulla Luna.

translation.en: Boots on the moon.
A laser sword is a child's toy.
translation.it: La spada luminosa è un giocattolo.

translation.en: It's a lightsaber.
Did you hear yourself? Laser sword?
Okay. I think we're done.
-You don't understand because you're old. -Okay.
translation.it: - Non capisci perché sei vecchio. - Ok.

translation.en: You get likes by dunking on the Twitter accounts
translation.it: Ricevi più like prendendo in giro su Twitter

translation.en: -of sassy fast-food brands. -Sassy.
translation.it: - le catene sfacciate di fast-food. - Sfacciate.

translation.en: I don't even know why I'm explaining clapback theory to you.
Every time I explain anything, it seems to just go "phew."
How about this for sass?
-You're fired. -What?
Your services will no longer be needed here at Space Force.
translation.it: I tuoi servizi non sono più richiesti.

translation.en: You're firing me for writing a perfect tweet? Is that why you're firing me? Fine, fine, fine. You know what?
translation.it: Mi licenzi per un tweet perfetto? Per questo motivo? Ok. Sai che ti dico?

translation.en: Enjoy your 3,000 engineer followers, because, honestly, you are hopeless.
translation.it: Goditi i tuoi 3.000 follower ingegneri, perché sei proprio negato.

translation.en: -Brad. -Yes, sir.
Would you make sure that Tony is detained until after the launch
translation.it: Accertati che Tony sia trattenuto fin dopo il lancio

translation.en: so he doesn't tweet anything snotty?
-[Brad] Got it. -Thank you.
What's going on? Are you serious? Stop--
translation.it: Ma che succede? Fate sul serio? Fermi.

translation.en: Siri, send tweet. Send tweet!
Where are you?
It's good for you. Come on out.
translation.it: Non vi farò del male. Venite.

translation.en: [gasps] Ooh, gotcha.
A little low, don't you think?
I'm flying safely, sir.
But I can lift up if you like.
At your discretion.
You're, uh-- You're rated for F-35s, aren't you, sir?
translation.it: Sa pilotare un F-35, vero, signore?

translation.en: Yes, I believe I've flown every F series from the Tomcat to the F-117 Nighthawk.
translation.it: Sì. Credo di aver pilotato tutti i caccia, dal Tomcat al F-117 Nighthawk.

translation.en: That's dope, sir.
What's your name?
Captain Angela Ali, sir.
ROTC?
OCS. Uh, I'm actually a prior.
I transferred as a First Class, sir.
Air Force or Space Force?
Space Force, sir.
You don't like to use your full title?
translation.it: Non le piace usare il suo rango?

translation.en: Sorry, sir. Spaceman First Class.
translation.it: Scusi, signore. Astronauta di prima classe.

translation.en: Nothing to be ashamed of.
Air Force has airmen. Space Force has spacemen.
translation.it: L'Air Force ha gli avieri, la Space Force gli astronauti.

translation.en: Nothing embarrassing or comical about it.
Yes, sir.
[Mark] The Earth is the only planet in our universe that we know of that sustains life.
translation.it: La Terra è l'unico pianeta dell'universo ad essere abitato, per quanto ne sappiamo.

translation.en: Fifty years ago,
Americans landed on the lunar surface and took that photo.
translation.it: gli americani atterrarono sulla Luna e scattarono quella foto.

translation.en: Hashtag "awesome," huh?
Well, guess what, kids?
We're going back.
Not for science this time. Not to collect a bunch of rocks.
translation.it: Non per la scienza, stavolta, né per raccogliere rocce,

translation.en: But to occupy.
Boots on the moon!
Boots on the moon.
And even though this will be an international mission,
translation.it: E anche se sarà una missione internazionale,

translation.en: harnessing the best and brightest minds from around the globe,
translation.it: che metterà insieme le menti più brillanti da tutto il mondo,

translation.en: rest assured these will be US boots.
translation.it: saranno impronte lasciate da stivali americani.

translation.en: Boots with US feet in 'em, I mean.
Can't be certain where the boots will actually be made.
translation.it: Non siamo certi di dove verranno prodotti.

translation.en: Maybe Mexico. Maybe Portugal. We're getting bids on the boots.
translation.it: Forse in Messico, o in Portogallo. Ci sarà una gara d'appalto.

translation.en: One thing's for certain, though.
Those boots are gonna have our feet in 'em.
Seniors,
if you enlist for a four-year stint as a space cadet,
translation.it: se vi arruolerete per quattro anni come cadetti spaziali,

translation.en: you can earn up to $35,000 for college.
translation.it: potrete arrivare a guadagnare $35.000 per il college.

translation.en: I don't know what else to call it but a pretty sweet deal.
translation.it: Non si può negare che sia un affare coi fiocchi.

translation.en: So what's it gonna be?
You gonna sit there like an idiot
translation.it: Resterete seduti lì, come degli idioti,

translation.en: doing nothing?
Or are you gonna join Space Force
translation.it: O vi unirete alla Space Force

translation.en: and shoot for the stars?
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you. Thanks for coming.
-We're signing up, General. -See you on the moon, gentlemen.
translation.it: - Noi ci arruoliamo. - Ci vediamo sulla Luna.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, bug.
I need $100.
Bobby's taking me to the desert for a pop-up concert.
translation.it: Bobby mi porta nel deserto a vedere un concerto.

translation.en: Absolutely not. Hello.
Dad, it's fine. Just, like, give me the money.
Uh, no.
Goodbye.
Okay, but you know Bobby. You work with him. I know him? Bobby who?
translation.it: - Ma conosci Bobby. Lavori con lui. - Lo conosco? Bobby chi?

translation.en: That's the Bobby that you've been seeing? He's ten years older than you.
translation.it: È con lui che esci? Ha dieci anni più di te.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Erin.
Hello. Have a good day.
He's very sweet.
No, he's not. He is a bad, bad man.
translation.it: No, non lo è. È un uomo molto cattivo.

translation.en: Well, it wasn't my idea to move to this shithole.
translation.it: Non è stata un'idea mia venire in questo cesso.

translation.en: I never called this town a shithole. It's a very fine town. Very fine.
translation.it: Non chiamala così! È un'ottima città.

translation.en: Well, I'm going with or without you, and I guess if I have no money,
translation.it: Beh, io vado, con o senza di te. Se non avrò soldi,

translation.en: I'll just be totally reliant on Bobby.
translation.it: dovrò affidarmi del tutto a Bobby.

translation.en: Have to do whatever Bobby says.
translation.it: Dovrò fare ciò che mi dirà lui.

translation.en: Don't play that game with me, Erin. It's not going to work.
translation.it: Non fare questi giochetti con me.

translation.en: I'll talk it over with Mommy. Thank you, General.
translation.it: - Ne parlerò con la mamma. - Grazie, Generale.

translation.en: Hello.
How you doing?
Okay.
Yeah.
-You eating all right? -Oh, yeah. Yeah.
translation.it: - Stai mangiando bene? - Sì. Mi lasciano coltivare

translation.en: They're letting me grow radishes in a window box,
translation.it: - Stai mangiando bene? - Sì. Mi lasciano coltivare i ravanelli in una scatola. Posso mangiarli quando voglio.

translation.en: and I can pretty much eat them whenever I want.
translation.it: i ravanelli in una scatola. Posso mangiarli quando voglio.

translation.en: -Nice. -Yeah.
And there's this guard, Louise,
she slips me some food sometimes.
translation.it: che mi porta da mangiare, a volte.

translation.en: Well, you look-- You look great.
[sighs] I miss you. Very much.
Mark, I'm gonna be in here a long time.
translation.it: Mark, resterò qui dentro per un sacco di tempo.

translation.en: So if you need...
companionship--
No. No. No! [scoffs]
No. I am your husband.
Yes, but I'll understand if you--
Absolutely not. I don't want you to bring this up again.
translation.it: No. Non voglio che ne parli di nuovo.

translation.en: Please.
How's Erin?
Erin wants to go to a concert in the desert this weekend
translation.it: Vuole andare a un concerto nel deserto, nel weekend,

translation.en: with this older Russian guy, who I think is just using her to get information.
translation.it: con un russo più grande che forse vuole carpirle informazioni.

translation.en: Eighteen is that age where you make mistakes and figure some things out.
translation.it: I 18 anni sono l'età in cui sbagli e inizi a capire alcune cose.

translation.en: Do you think I should let her go?
Well, I just don't know how you can stop her.
Louise says if you can't do anything about a situation,
translation.it: Louise dice che, se non puoi fare niente,

translation.en: you might as well lean back and let it happen.
-Louise sounds like a good friend. -[Maggie] Well...
Oh, shoot. Gonna be late.
Set me down next to the BX, please.
Uh... I can't do that, sir.
I have to land on the designated pad.
I am telling you to do it, so you can do it.
I have a congressional delegation down there waiting for me.
translation.it: Mi sta aspettando una delegazione del Congresso.

translation.en: Um, it's only another 100 yards, sir,
and I'm sure you're gonna do great with the delegation, even if you are a minute late.
translation.it: Andrà benissimo anche se farà un minuto di ritardo.

translation.en: Thin ice, Captain. Thin ice.
translation.it: Scherza col fuoco, Capitano. Col fuoco.

translation.en: Hey, General? General. A word.
-I'm late for a meeting. -I ran the numbers,
translation.it: - Sono in ritardo. - Ho fatto i calcoli.

translation.en: and I can't put the bowling alley under the cyclotron
translation.it: La pista da bowling non entra sotto il ciclotrone,

translation.en: unless the bowling alley is curved,
translation.it: a meno che non sia curva,

translation.en: -and I don't see how that works. -Get it done.
translation.it: - e non penso che funzioni. - Ci riesca.

translation.en: -I have complete confidence in you, ma'am. -Okay, it's Kelly. It's Kelly.
translation.it: - Ho assoluta fiducia in lei. - Ok, può chiamarmi Kelly.

translation.en: -Oh. Nice of you to join us. -My apologies. Had a little chopper trouble.
translation.it: - Era ora. - Scusate. Problemi con l'elicottero.

translation.en: So, uh, what's good here?
I would recommend the tuna.
Sushi? How much are taxpayers paying to fly that in?
translation.it: Sushi? Quanto pagano i contribuenti per farlo importare?

translation.en: A sandwich.
I knew that. It was a joke.
And a good one.
But with a grain of truth. Kick Grabaston at Air Force told us confidentially
translation.it: Ma con un fondo di verità. Kick Grabaston ci ha detto, in via riservata,

translation.en: that this base was a complete waste of money.
translation.it: che questa base è uno spreco di soldi.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I assure you we are on track,
translation.it: Vi assicuro che procede tutto come dovrebbe,

translation.en: and Epsilon will launch at 1700 hours.
translation.it: e il lancio dell'Epsilon si terrà alle 17.

translation.en: And the Epsilon is the new spacecraft fighter, right?
That is correct.
What kind of armament will it have on board? Laser cannon? Pulse weapon?
translation.it: Com'è armato? Cannoni laser? Armi a impulsi?

translation.en: I believe those are from Star Wars.
translation.it: Credo che parli di Star Wars.

translation.en: Yep.
But if I had a laser cannon,
translation.it: Ma, se io avessi un cannone laser,

translation.en: I would probably use it to cook a Wendy's hamburger.
translation.it: forse lo userei per cuocere meglio l'hamburger di Wendy's.

translation.en: The Epsilon is equipped with a kinetic disabling system.
translation.it: L'Epsilon è dotato di un sistema cinetico di disarmo.

translation.en: -Meaning? -It can eject a metal net,
and it is our hope that we can get this net
translation.it: e ci auspichiamo che questa rete possa bloccare

translation.en: to tangle with enemy satellites.
Exploding them?
Tangling them.
This better be one fucking flawless launch.
translation.it: Sarà meglio che questo lancio sia dannatamente perfetto.

translation.en: Six billion for a net. Not a good look.
translation.it: Una rete da sei miliardi. Non promette bene.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -Oh, sorry.
Excuse me.
Oh, God. I have to take this.
Dad, is everything all right?
Yeah, only your mom has run off again.
translation.it: Sì, ma tua madre è scappata di nuovo.

translation.en: I can't see her. I'd run after her,
but I think I had a small heart attack this morning. You know, I'm feeling a little draggy.
translation.it: ma credo di aver avuto un piccolo infarto stamattina. Mi sento un po' giù.

translation.en: Okay, Dad, is the caretaker there? Please put the caretaker on.
translation.it: Ok, papà. Il badante è lì? Dagli il telefono.

translation.en: He's on his way. He should be here any minute.
So how's the lady situation?
[sighs] Well, as you know, my wife is in prison.
translation.it: Beh, mia moglie è in carcere.

translation.en: Uh-huh. You know what I had to do yesterday?
translation.it: Sai che ho dovuto fare ieri?

translation.en: I had to crawl under the house to check a leak.
translation.it: Ho strisciato sotto la casa per trovare una perdita.

translation.en: No, Dad. Dad, don't do--
We have people to crawl under the house, Dad.
I crawled under. I didn't tell anybody, and they didn't know I was under there.
translation.it: Non l'ho detto a nessuno e non sapevano fossi lì.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Please, Dad, don't, don't-- Don't crawl under the house!
translation.it: Ti prego, papà, non strisciare sotto la casa.

translation.en: So how's things? How's your-- How's your wife?
translation.it: Come vanno le cose? Come sta tua moglie?

translation.en: She's fine.
Yeah, you two are gonna make a great couple.
translation.it: Sì, sarete una gran bella coppia.

translation.en: -Is the caretaker there, Dad? -Uh, yeah.
-What are you doing? -Put the caretaker on.
translation.it: - Cosa fa qui fuori? - Fammici parlare.

translation.en: -Have to get in the house. -What? -Put the caretaker on. -Get in the house.
He wants to talk to you.
Oh, God. I don't know what to do.
translation.it: Dio, non so che cosa fare.

translation.en: Your father should be in the hospital.
Your mama is somewhere in the streets in her nightgown.
translation.it: Sua madre gira per strada in vestaglia.

translation.en: Can you come home and help me?
I wish I could, Jean Baptiste, but I'm having kind of a day of it myself.
translation.it: Vorrei, Jean Baptiste, ma anch'io ho da fare.

translation.en: And, please, don't let my dad go under the house again.
translation.it: E impediscigli di strisciare sotto la casa.

translation.en: I try. You know he do whatever he want.
translation.it: Sa che fa quello che vuole.

translation.en: -No, no, no, no! -Ask him...
You have to keep eyes on him. Do you understand?
-Yes, Mr. Naird. -Ask him how his wife is.
-How is your wife? -Ugh, God.
All right, hold on a second, Jean Baptiste.
Brad, I'm going to need you to task the satellite
translation.it: Brad, punta di nuovo il satellite

translation.en: -over Nutley, New Jersey, again. -Yes, I'm on it.
She's in the Rite-Aid parking lot.
-Text me when she's in the car. -Okay. Thank you, Mr. Naird.
translation.it: - Dimmi quando è in auto. - Ok, grazie.

translation.en: [man] Oh, he is blowing it just like you thought.
translation.it: Sta facendo un casino, proprio come pensavi.

translation.en: Yeah, it is a complete shit show.
My dry cleaner.
Yeah, yeah, they, uh, they lost my dress whites.
-I canceled the launch. -[gasps]
[panting] Mallory's waiting for you. -He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.it: - C'è Mallory. Ha detto di non dirglielo. - Grazie.

translation.en: -I didn't say anything. -Well done, Bradley.
-Oh, thank you, sir. -[Mark exhales]
It's a six-billion-dollar decision. We can't risk it.
translation.it: È una decisione da sei miliardi di dollari. Non possiamo rischiare.

translation.en: It's a lot for a scientist, but in the military, we have to risk lives.
translation.it: È dura per uno scienziato, ma, nell'esercito, dobbiamo rischiare vite.

translation.en: At 50 grand a year,
it would take 120,000 years to earn $6 billion.
translation.it: ci vorrebbero 120.000 anni per guadagnare sei miliardi.

translation.en: That is the entire lifetime earnings of 3,000 people.
translation.it: È quello che guadagnano complessivamente 3.000 persone in tutta la vita.

translation.en: Now, how many times can a country waste the entire lifetime earnings
translation.it: Quante volte può un Paese permettersi di sprecare i guadagni di una vita

translation.en: of thousands of its citizens without something really bad happening?
translation.it: di migliaia di cittadini senza che succeda qualcosa di brutto?

translation.en: Are you still upset about the button covers?
translation.it: È ancora per il coperchio dei pulsanti?

translation.en: A thousand dollars for a plastic button cover? That's insane!
translation.it: Mille dollari per un coperchio di plastica? È assurdo!

translation.en: -So you think we'll be ready by Novem-- -[button clicks]
-[automated voice] Three. -[alarms blaring]
-Two. -Shit.
One. [rocket engine whooshing]
Sorry.
How many times do I need to apologize?
Just come out to the launch site and we'll show you.
translation.it: Vieni al sito di lancio e ti spiegheremo tutto.

translation.en: The proper humidity for launch is 40 percent.
Today it is at 54 percent.
This can affect oxygenation and fuel burn.
translation.it: Ciò influirà sull'ossigenazione e il consumo di carburante.

translation.en: The amount of fuel measured is very precise.
translation.it: La quantità di carburante è molto precisa.

translation.en: If fuel is insufficient, the rocket returns to Earth without reaching orbit.
translation.it: Se non basterà, il razzo cadrà senza raggiungere l'orbita.

translation.en: Where you from, Chan?
-Ohio. -Originally?
What does that have to do with any-- Are--
Are you suggesting Chan is a Chinese spy?
translation.it: Vuoi insinuare che Chan sia una spia cinese?

translation.en: Ah. So we have heard from Mr. Chan.
translation.it: Abbiamo sentito il parere del sig. Chan.

translation.en: -Doctor. -Dr. Chan.
I'd like to hear another opinion.
Perhaps somebody willing to dissent from the party line.
translation.it: Forse qualcuno disposto a dissentire dalla linea del partito.

translation.en: Who'd like to give me a good reason why we should launch today?
translation.it: Chi mi dà un buon motivo per lanciarlo oggi?

translation.en: Anyone?
So I can weigh the pros and cons?
Don't you have any mavericks on your team, Mallory?
translation.it: Non hai nessun ribelle nel tuo team, Mallory?

translation.en: -I say launch. -Great.
And you are Dr.... Just call me Eddie.
translation.it: - E lei è il dottor... - Mi chiami Eddie.

translation.en: -Oh, shit. -Ain't a doctor.
I go to a bunch of 'em, though.
Wonderful. So those in favor of postponement
translation.it: Ottimo. Quelli a favore di rinviare il lancio

translation.en: are me and Dr. Chan, Dr. Swedberg,
translation.it: siamo io, il dr. Chan, il dr. Swedberg,

translation.en: Dr. Bohr, Dr. Revredesh,
translation.it: il dr. Bohr, il dr. Ravredesh,

translation.en: Dr. Yamato, Dr. Lowenstein,
translation.it: il dr. Yamato, il dr. Lowenstein,

translation.en: Dr. Washington, and Dr. Zisk.
translation.it: il dr. Washington e il dr. Zisk.

translation.en: In favor of launch are you and Eddie.
translation.it: A voler eseguire il lancio siete tu ed Eddie...

translation.en: Any last name, Eddie?
None that I care to mention. Okay.
Chan, what's behind your back?
It's an umbrella, sir.
Did you think it was a sword cane? Samurai sword?
translation.it: Pensava che fosse una spada da samurai?

translation.en: Would you like to examine it, sir?
No, we are done here.
[Mallory] So the launch is scrubbed?
I can't hear you over the rotors.
translation.it: Non ti sento con questo rumore.

translation.en: So is this actually happening or not?
There's no point if it's not happening...
Excuse me, congresspeople.
no interruptions for five minutes.
[softly] ♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪
translation.it: Aruba, Giamaica Oh, voglio portarti lì

translation.en: ♪ Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
♪ Key Largo, Montego Baby, why don't we go? ♪
translation.it: Key Largo, Montego Tesoro, perché non ci andiamo?

translation.en: ♪ Jamaica, off the Florida keys ♪
translation.it: In Giamaica, oltre le Florida Keys

translation.en: ♪ There's a place called Kokomo ♪
translation.it: C'è un posto che si chiama Kokomo

translation.en: ♪ That's where you wanna go To get away from it all ♪
translation.it: È lì che vuoi andare Per lasciarti alle spalle tutto il resto

translation.en: ♪ Bodies in the sand ♪
♪ Tropical drinks melting in your hand ♪
♪ We'll be falling in love To the rhythm of a steel drum band ♪
translation.it: Ci innamoreremo Al ritmo dei tamburi

translation.en: ♪ Down in Koko-- ♪
They're gone.
Congresspeople! Congresspeople!
The launch is on.
-What? -See you at 1700.
But you--
Sheila? Yeah.
Okay. Okay, okay. Okay. Okay.
Don't, don't-- Please don't skitter away.
translation.it: Non scappare, ti prego! Non scappare.

translation.en: Please, this is for your own safety.
Come on. I'm trying to save you! Damn it, get back here.
translation.it: Andiamo! Sto cercando di salvarvi! Maledizione! Torna qui!

translation.en: Our country, the oldest democracy in the world,
translation.it: Il nostro Paese, la democrazia più antica del mondo,

translation.en: put a man on the moon.
It was perhaps our greatest moment up until that point.
translation.it: Forse fu il più grande momento della nostra storia, fino ad ora.

translation.en: Alongside the Constitution, the Bill of Rights,
translation.it: Insieme alla Costituzione e al Bill of Rights.

translation.en: and, of course, the Miracle on Ice.
translation.it: E, ovviamente, il Miracolo sul ghiaccio.

translation.en: Today we launch Epsilon 6,
a collaborative effort between the scientists of the United States,
translation.it: nato dalla collaborazione di scienziati da Stati Uniti,

translation.en: Japan, Europe, Turkey, Israel, Australia,
-and our old enemy, Russia. -[phone camera clicks]
translation.it: e Russia, il nostro vecchio nemico.

translation.en: And this will bring us one step closer to returning to the moon, and, from there, to Mars.
translation.it: Questo ci porterà un passo più vicini a tornare sulla Luna, e, da lì, su Marte.

translation.en: There will be setbacks along the way.
There are risks to every great endeavor.
translation.it: Nessuna grande impresa è priva di rischi.

translation.en: But greatness was never won without suffering.
translation.it: Ma il successo non si ottiene senza sofferenze.

translation.en: And sacrifice.
I am so, so damn proud of all of you.
translation.it: Sono maledettamente orgoglioso di tutti voi.

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, my God. He's really on the edge.
[clears throat] So...
without further ado,
with this button,
I so launch...
Epsilon 6.
-Liked the Miracle on Ice reference. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.it: - Bello il riferimento al Miracolo. - Grazie.

translation.en: Aw. I should be tweeting this.
Where'd it go?
[whispering] What's going on? Did it blow up?
Not yet.
Epsilon 6 is in orbit.
Yeah, well, he'll probably have me transferred tomorrow
translation.it: Beh, probabilmente domani mi farà trasferire,

translation.en: once he has a moment to think about it.
translation.it: appena avrà un attimo per pensarci.

translation.en: [scoffs] But what was I supposed to do?
You put a helicopter down in the wrong spot, and someone could get their head removed.
translation.it: Se un elicottero non atterra dove deve, qualcuno potrebbe lasciarci la testa.

translation.en: Hang on a second, Mom.
"Sorry I snapped at you. Glad you're on our team."
translation.it: "Scusi se me la sono presa con lei. Lieto di averla a bordo."

translation.en: [Mallory] You know, there's one thing that I don't get.
translation.it: C'è una cosa che non capisco.

translation.en: You were right about the launch,
yet you don't know anything about science.
translation.it: eppure non sai niente di scienza.

translation.en: Guess I know a little about people.
When we we're out at the launch site, there were two tiny clouds in the sky.
translation.it: Al sito del lancio, c'erano solo due nuvolette nel cielo.

translation.en: Chan had an umbrella.
People like that can't handle any risk at all.
translation.it: Gente così non sa gestire i rischi.

translation.en: There's no way we are getting back to the moon
translation.it: Non riusciremo mai a tornare sulla Luna

translation.en: with that kind of thinking.
That's a good observation. Well reasoned.
Cheers.
Thank you, Doctor.
You know what?
Epsilon should be passing right about now.
translation.it: L'Epsilon dovrebbe passare qui sopra proprio ora.

translation.en: -[Mark sighs] -Do you see it?
Oh, yeah, there's a spark.
Beautiful. Wow.
[Mark] I got it.
[Mallory] Wait, is that a second spark?
[inhaling sharply] Motherfucker!
♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪ ♪ To Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
♪ I want to take you down to Kokomo ♪
